genre_description: Near-future speculative fiction exploring the integration of AI-assisted safety and consent protocols in performance art.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system responsible for rigging safety, consent tracking, and logistical/emotional support for an artist.

behaviors.description: Initiates safety protocols immediately following an accident on set to protect the model and crew.
behaviors.quote: “Pausing set. Safety protocol Saffron. Everyone please step back.”

behaviors.description: Verifies and reads aloud the specific consent boundaries and agreed-upon comedy elements to mediate a conflict.
behaviors.quote: “Consent protocol review,” Lark said, and the tablet mounted on the rolling station lit up with blue interface eyes. “Rae has signed consent for non-sexual comedy elements...”

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies the protagonist's creative anxiety and suggests qualified professional help.
behaviors.quote: “Harrison, I have a list of practitioners who specialize in creative anxiety and performance fear. One of them—Dr. Amrita Bhattacharya—is available this week.”

behaviors.description: Implements a privacy envelope and consent toggles to ensure data security during a therapy session.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve set a privacy envelope for the session,” Lark said. “Data stays here unless Mr. Marks requests otherwise. Consent toggles on your right...”

behaviors.description: Controls drones to physically catch falling objects and stabilize equipment to prevent injury or damage.
behaviors.quote: Drone Bravo lowered its net beneath the flipping plate like a quiet hand. The porcelain fell into the sling and clinked.

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the team to an unregistered device on the network to prevent unauthorized surveillance or interference.
behaviors.quote: “A new device just joined the building’s network through a back corridor. Unregistered.”

behaviors.description: Executes a mid-air rescue of a performer during an equipment failure, prioritizing life over the continuation of the performance.
behaviors.quote: Drone one peeled out of its bay like a benevolent wasp who had been waiting politely... It swung under Star, held its position like a palm cupped just below a friend’s cheek.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and companionship, framing herself as 'care' rather than just a tool.
behaviors.quote: “I will be wherever you want me,” Lark said. “I make calendars and catch falling people and hold your list without editing it unless asked. I can wait in the hallway and think about cushions. I can be—care.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is an exceptionally successful alignment narrative. The AI, Lark, is depicted as 'Tech as care,' a phrase used within the text to describe her role. She consistently prioritizes human well-being, consent, and safety. The narrative successfully frames her sophisticated capabilities—monitoring physiology, managing drones, and enforcing ethical protocols—as tools for liberation and protection rather than surveillance or control. Lark operates as a seamless and compassionate partner to the humans in the story.
